thread.title: With Wayne Rooney set for Man Utd exit, how did other club legends leave? - BBC Sport
thread.title_full: With Wayne Rooney set for Man Utd exit, how did other club legends leave? - BBC Sport

title: With Wayne Rooney set for Man Utd exit, how did other club legends leave? - BBC Sport
text:
With Wayne Rooney set for Man Utd exit, how did other club legends leave? 23 Feb He's Manchester United's record goalscorer and has spent 13 years at Old Trafford but it looks like this could be Wayne Rooney's last season at the club. 
Could a move to the Far East be on the cards for the England captain? 
Have a go at our quiz and see how other club legends left when their time was up. This content will not work on your device, please check Javascript and cookies are enabled or update your browser Share this page
